titles.title: fishRman: A Shiny R Dashboard improving Global Fishing Watch data availability

citation.unstructured_citation: R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing, R Core Team, R Foundation for Statistical Computing, Vienna, Austria, 2013, http://www.R-project.org/

shiny: Web Application Framework for R, Chang, Winston and Cheng, Joe and Allaire, JJ and Sievert, Carson and Schloerke, Barret and Xie, Yihui and Allen, Jeff and McPherson, Jonathan and Dipert, Alan and Borges, Barbara, 2021, R package version 1.6.0, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=shiny
shinyjs: Easily Improve the User Experience of Your Shiny Apps in Seconds, Attali, Dean, 2020, R package version 2.0.0, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=shinyjs
shinyWidgets: Custom Inputs Widgets for Shiny, Perrier, Victor and Meyer, Fanny and Granjon, David, 2021, R package version 0.6.0, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=shinyWidgets
DBI: R Database Interface, R Special Interest Group on Databases (R-SIG-DB) and Wickham, Hadley and Müller, Kirill, 2021, R package version 1.1.1, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=DBI
bigrquery: An Interface to Google’s ’BigQuery’ ’API’, Wickham, Hadley and Bryan, Jennifer, 2020, R package version 1.3.2, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=bigrquery
glue: Interpreted String Literals, Hester, Jim, 2020, R package version 1.4.2, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=glue
R package stringi: Character string processing facilities, Gagolewski, Marek, 2020, https://stringi.gagolewski.com/
maps: Draw Geographical Maps, Becker, Richard A. and Wilks, Allan R. and Brownrigg, Ray and Minka, Thomas P. and Deckmyn, Alex, 2018, R package version 3.3.0, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=maps
Wickham, Hadley, ggplot2: Elegant Graphics for Data Analysis, Springer-Verlag New York, 2016, 978-3-319-24277-4, https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org
shinyBS: Twitter Bootstrap Components for Shiny, Bailey, Eric, 2015, R package version 0.61, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=shinyBS
dplyr: A Grammar of Data Manipulation, Wickham, Hadley and François, Romain and Henry, Lionel and Müller, Kirill, 2021, R package version 1.0.6, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=dplyr
Global Fishing Watch data, Global Fishing Watch, https://globalfishingwatch.org/, 2021, Accessed: 2021-10-08
Working with our downloadable public data in R, Clavelle, Tyler, https://globalfishingwatch.org/data/working-with-our-downloadable-public-data-in-r/, 2019, Accessed: 2021-10-08
Working with our public data: Google Earth Engine, Clavelle, Tyler, https://globalfishingwatch.org/data/working-with-our-public-data-google-earth-engine/, 2019, Accessed: 2021-10-08
Getting Global Fishing Watch Data from Google Big Query using R, Mayorga, Juan S., http://jsmayorga.com/post/getting-global-fishing-watch-from-google-bigquery-using-r/, 2018, Accessed: 2021-10-08
